overview:
Eddy is a co-founder of Kikini, a social matchmaking service. At Kikini, Eddy designs and implements the company’s recommendation infrastructure and is also responsible for database query performance. At home, he plays drums and drinks things that have gin.

Eddy worked as a Software Design Engineer for Microsoft for almost eight years before leaving for Kikini, during which time he obtained a master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Washington. He also holds a BS in Computer Science, Mathematics and Economics from Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology and a birth certificate from Peru.
